row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_JSON
row.description: Create simple json of type key:value

row.Docu: This include is used to create a json string of type "key":"value".The value of separator needs to be set to empty string or literal and when this include is called it will set it to comma (",") and futher string will be appended at the end of string variable UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS#(initialize this varaible with empty string) separated by comma.
